MappingsTagClass.Display: 3D Parametric Vertical Inline Pump menu pick
3D Double Pipe Heat Exchanger menu pick
3D Shell Tube Heat Exchanger menu pick

MappingsTagClass.Remarks: There is no 'ELECTRIC_BOILER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'. There is a 'REBOILER',but that is not under BOILER
There is no 'FIRED_BOILER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'. There is a 'REBOILER',but that is not under BOILER
There is no 'WATERTUBE_BOILER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'. There is a 'REBOILER',but that is not under BOILER
There is no 'AIRCOOLED_CHILLER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'.
There is no 'EVAPORATIVE_CHILLER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'.
There is no 'WATERCOOLED_CHILLER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'.
There is no 'SURFACE_CONDENSER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'
There is no 'WATERTUBE_BOILER' in 2D. Closest is 'HEAT_EXCHANGER'.
There is no 'SCRUBBER' in 2D. Closest is 'SEPARATOR'.
There is no 'HOPPER' in 2D. Closest is the 'Vessels' target group which contains all the Vessels.

MappingsTagClass.Display: 3D Centrifugal Upblast Exhaust Ventilator menu pick

MappingsTagClass.Comment: should ROTATING_EQUIPMENT be in here?,in PID ROTATING_EQUIPMENT is the base class for CONVEYOR,COMPRESSOR,MIXER...

MappingsTagClass.Comment_FilterByProperty: Use the property names of FilterByProperty to get a property value. This property value is then used to match the value in the standard preference dialog

MappingsTagClass.Comment_IsPolymorphic: Must be set to true because of class hierarchy. Control valves have two base classes: INSTRUMENT and VALVE
MappingsTagClass.Comment_FilterByProperty: Cannot have SPECIFICATION in filter query because of class hierarchy, SPECIFICATION is not in INSTRUMENT class
MappingsTagClass.Comment_FilterByProperty1: To have SPECIFICATION in filter, set cfg m_useFilterByPropertyInQuery=0, this is because it builds up a list of properties for dual class hierarchies

MappingsTagClass.Comment: PropertyMatchRelationship is required to get Correct properties updated from relationship. Example NOMINAL_DIAMETER.
These properties will be updated from the relationship match which in this case should be PIPING_NETWORK_SEGMENT
Uses the match: NOMINAL_DIAMETER=SIZE. This is done because the FLOW_METER does not have the NOMINAL_DIAMETER property
MappingsTagClass.Comment1: FLOW_METER does have SIZE Property. Still needs NOMINAL_DIAMETER to get current value from Standard Preferences

MappingsTagClass.Comments: IsPolymorphic = true and op:PUMP must set to get all valid classes from the query

TaggingScopes.COMMENT: These items are classes as defined in the Tagging schema. They are used to query Classes for the conssistency checker.

TaggingScopes.Name: INSTRUMENT
TaggingScopes.Comment: The property value defined will be used as grouping filter in the tree display. This is parent inwhich nodes will be grouped under.

ConsistencyNeededRelationships.Name: PIPELINE_HAS_SEGMENT
ConsistencyNeededRelationships.Comment: This is used to get get segments. Pipeline->Run->Components. Nests query to get graph tree for getrelationships

ConsistencyProperties.Name: CompareOptions
ConsistencyProperties.Comment: Show items that match and have an empty value (empty strings, no value,...)
When checking properties values, ignore upper or lower case
When checking property values ignore ? value
Prompt when committing changes to iModel

ConsistencyProperties.Name: ProhibitPropertyUpdate
ConsistencyProperties.Display: Display but do not allow update

ConsistencyProperties.Name: AllowPropertyUpdate
ConsistencyProperties.Display: Allow property update even in if OpenPlant3DCatalogueAttributeProperties = true or ProhibitPropertyUpdate = true

Issues.Name: NAME
Issues.Display:
The Tag Number must be modified from the Edit Properties Dialog.
To change, Check out the Tag number, then edit the value from the Standard Preferences dialog.

TagDisplayAttributes.Name: PlacedIn2D
TagDisplayAttributes.Description: Placed in a P&ID drawing display attributes

TagDisplayAttributes.Name: PlacedIn3D
TagDisplayAttributes.Description: Placed in a 3D Physical Model display attributes

TagDisplayAttributes.Name: ActiveModel
TagDisplayAttributes.Description: Placed in currently opened Active Model display attributes

TagDisplayAttributes.Name: NotPlaced
TagDisplayAttributes.Description: Not placed in any document or model

TagDisplayAttributes.Name: DisplayOptions
TagDisplayAttributes.Comment: Show in Class Hierarchy from code scope in display: Class,WBS,Document
If there are more then specified nodes the expand is turned off
If the instance is part of a relationship, then do no show as a top level tree node

ConsistencyReportsOptions.Name: Html
ConsistencyReportsOptions.HtmlDifferenceTableStyle: table,th,td { border: 1px solid black; border-collapse: collapse; background-color: #eee; text-align: left;}
